articles.title: Mike Woodson to resign at Indiana: Hoosiers coach to step down when season ends - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Hoosiers are outside the NCAA Tournament picture as of now and have been a disappointment after spending big in the portal
articles.content: Amid a disappointing campaign that's tracking toward missing the NCAA Tournament for a second straight year, Indiana coach Mike Woodson plans to step down at the end of this season, Hoosiers athletic… [+3915 chars]

articles.author: Molly Bohannon, Derek Saul
articles.title: Musk Says He’ll Rehire DOGE’s Marko Elez After Racist Posts: Here’s What To Know About Agency - Forbes
articles.description: Marko Elez, the DOGE staffer who resigned after racist social media posts including a call to "normalize Indian hate" surfaced, will return to work for Musk, the billionaire announced.
articles.content: Just one day after a high-ranking agent of Elon Musks Department of Government Efficiency resigned from his position due to a history of racist posts, Musk announced his underlings return, a comeback… [+13006 chars]
